page.title: 18Shopping
page.content: We go to Henley for our shopping & also to Reading for the larger Stores, particularly for clothes.There is not a shop in Harpsden but there is a small General Store on the boundary with Henley.Also,going into Henley is a Sub Post Office,which sells newspapers, cards & sweets,& a cake shop. In Henley,there is a good & popular supermarket,Waitrose,& also a cheaper Tesco & Co-op.Other food shops are the bakers,greengrocers & a delicatessan. The larger Stores are W.H.Smiths and Woolworths.Currys & Hammants sell electrical goods & Champions is an ironmongers.There are 5 shops which sell books,3 have toys.There are shops which sell china,flowers,cars,menswear, wine,antiques,material,& ladies'clothes There are 3 Art Galleries & many Estate Agents.People travel to Reading a lot by car.There is a new hypermarket there
